title: Darling in the Franxx
description: In a dystopian future, children pilot giant mechs called Franxx to protect humanity. Hiro, a failed pilot, meets Zero Two, a mysterious girl with horns, and their partnership changes everything.

title: Naruto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a sealed demon fox inside him, dreams of becoming Hokage while facing trials and enemies in the Hidden Leaf Village.

title: Naruto Shippuden
description: Older Naruto returns after training to face stronger threats, uncover his destiny, and save his friend Sasuke from darkness.

title: Chainsaw Man
description: Denji, a poor devil hunter, merges with his pet Pochita to become Chainsaw Man—a being who slaughters devils for the government while chasing simple dreams.

title: The Daily Life of the Immortal King
description: Wang Ling, an overpowered cultivator, tries to live a normal high school life while hiding his godlike abilities.

title: Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead
description: After a zombie apocalypse, a burnt-out office worker rediscovers joy by completing his bucket list amidst the chaos.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Yuji Itadori swallows a cursed finger and joins a secret organization to exorcise curses while controlling the demon within him.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: Goku and allies defend Earth against intergalactic threats like Frieza, Cell, and Majin Buu through epic battles.

title: Dragon Ball Super
description: Goku faces gods of destruction, alternate-universe warriors, and the omnipotent Zeno in universe-spanning conflicts.

title: Mashle: Magic and Muscles
description: In a magic-dominated world, Mash Burnedead relies on brute strength to survive magic school and become a Divine Visionary.

title: Demon Slayer
description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to cure his sister Nezuko and avenge his family after a demon attack.

title: More Than a Married Couple, But Not Lovers
description: High school students in a forced marriage practicum navigate fake relationships and real feelings.

title: Blood-C
description: Saya Kisaragi, a shrine maiden with sword skills, battles grotesque Elder Bairns in a gory supernatural horror.

title: Komi Can't Communicate
description: Shy Komi strives to make 100 friends with help from her classmate Tadano in this heartwarming comedy.

title: Vermeil in Gold
description: A struggling mage accidentally summons a seductive demon to be his familiar, leading to risqué magical antics.

title: The Testament of Sister New Devil
description: Basara Toujou forms erotic contracts with demon sisters to battle supernatural threats in this ecchi action series.

title: High School DxD
description: Issei Hyoudou, a pervy devil servant, fights fallen angels and dragons while building a harem in this raunchy battle anime.

title: Monster Musume: Everyday Life with Monster Girls
description: Kimihito hosts seductive monster girls (lamia, harpy, slime) in a government exchange program gone wild.

title: The Greatest Demon Lord Is Reborn as a Typical Nobody
description: OP demon lord Varvatos reincarnates to fix his social awkwardness but remains hilariously overpowered.

title: Akudama Drive
description: A civilian gets entangled with elite criminals in a cyberpunk heist gone wrong.

title: Handyman Saitou in Another World
description: A handyman uses real-world skills to thrive in a fantasy RPG-like world.

title: One Punch Man
description: Saitama, a hero who defeats enemies with one punch, seeks a worthy challenge in this satirical action series.

title: Lookism
description: A bullied teen discovers he can switch between two bodies—one handsome, one outcast—unveiling society's beauty bias.
